sentences.en: Hundreds are initiated into the sect each year.
sentences.cn: 每年有好几百人被接纳到这个教派中。

sentences.en: Every conceivable Protestant sect was publishing treatises of theological speculation and religious propaganda at a surprising rate.
sentences.cn: 任何能想到的新教派别都在以惊人的速度出版神学思辨的论文和宗教宣传的论文。

sentences.en: Rarely do the Amish marry outside their sect.
sentences.cn: amish人很少和他们宗派以外的人通婚。
